meanings.definition: Pleasing or appealing to the senses or mind
meanings.sent1: The colorful flowers in the garden were very attractive to the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful sunset was so attractive that everyone stopped to admire it.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog was so attractive that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like an attractive melody that soothed all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh cookies baking in the oven was incredibly attractive.

meanings.definition: Having the power to draw attention or interest
meanings.sent1: The shiny object was so attractive that it caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The movie had an attractive plot that kept the audience engaged throughout.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten was so attractive that it caused chaos wherever it went.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an attractive magnet, drawing people towards her.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious book cover was incredibly attractive, making everyone curious to read it.

meanings.definition: Having qualities that are desirable or appealing
meanings.sent1: The job offer came with an attractive salary that was hard to resist.
meanings.sent2: The new car model had many attractive features that made it popular.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a pizza vending machine seemed strangely attractive to some.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was like an attractive charm that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The prospect of a beach vacation was incredibly attractive to the tired workers.
